name: Inside the Cube
description:
There are more levels after the credits!

Yes, I regret putting them there already.

Traverse a 3D room 2D at a time. 

You're a green cube and must get to the green platform by shifting perspective and looking at the room in 2D. There are a few hand-made levels so players can learn and get a grip on the gameplay. Then, you can play indefinitely in randomly generated levels (solvability not guaranteed).

Made in 48h for the Ludum Dare 37 Compo under the theme "One Room".

This was my first time participating in a Ludum Dare and working completely solo. I guess it turned out pretty okay in the end.

Link for the Ludum Dare entry: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-37/?action=preview&uid=122778. Please rate and comment. Any feedback is appreciated.

Tools used:

Unity

sfxr

paint.net

Color Scheme Designer
